www.datascienceanywhere.com
Smoothing Filters
Blurring 

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur
Smoothing Filter

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur
‚Ä¢ Step-1: Define ùëò√ó ùëòsliding window on top of the image.
‚Ä¢ ùëòis always odd number
‚Ä¢ Step-2: Slide the window from left to right and top to bottom
‚Ä¢ Step-3: For each stride (usually stride =1), pixel at the center of the 
matrix is Median of pixels surrounding it. 

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur
‚Ä¢ Median blurring is more effective at removing salt and pepper 
style noise from the image.

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur for Salt-Pepper Noise

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur (3 x 3)

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur (5 x 5)

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur (7 x 7)

www.datascienceanywhere.com
Median Blur (11 x 11)
